author: Jerry "The Professor" Thomas
description: The rich style of genever combines wonderfully with orange liqueur in this balanced classic.
name: Gin Daisy #2 (Jerry Thomas style)
recipeIngredient: 15 ml Grand Marnier or other cognac orange liqueur
7.5 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0Â°brix)

recipeInstructions.text: SHAKE first four ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass
TOP with a splash of soda from a siphon
